description:
What people have said about this Guided Meditation Course:

" I've listened to a good amount of guided meditations before - for example off of you tube....and some are pretty good. However, I've so far found yours to be absolutely FANTASTIC!!! "

~Robert N.

"Not sure why but I got tears while listening to the meditation, I love it!"

-Laura G.

"Some of the approaches are very interesting. Thanks!"


Guided Meditation Course updated as of February 22nd, 2016.

Make sure to listen to the deep spiritual Guided Meditation with headphones and check out the free previews and sample!

Being a Positive Person is your True Natural State of Being. Unfortunately well intentioned but uninformed parents, relatives, the media and society have led us to believe that people who are positive are rare.

This Spiritual Guided Meditation will remind you of your true nature so you become a naturally positive person all the time.

This Guided Meditation uses strong hypnotic techniques to achieve the deepest relaxation possible to reach your subconscious mind which lays the ground for the spiritual guided meditations to boost your transformation and reprogram your subconscious mind in the shortest possible time.

These relaxation techniques combined with strong spiritual concepts embedded in the script of the Guided Meditation create a powerful combo that transforms you from the inside out.

In this Guided Meditation course you will:

  • Understand why you are in a negative state of mind most of the time
  • How to change your thoughts so they become positive with our without meditation
  • Find a deep spiritual 60 minutes long guided meditation to reprogram your subconscious mind to be positive.
  • Download the 60 minutes long deep guided meditation so you can listen to it anywhere!

This deep spiritual guided meditation will is a great tool to assist you in your transformation into a positive person very soon!
title: Meditation - Guided Meditation To Be Positive!
